settings.parseAscii: Replace common ASCII characters like :), -_-, etc
settings.parseNative: Replace native unicode emoji characters with emoji provided by emoji packs
settings.customFirst: Place your custom emoji first in the dialog
build_description:
Compile the necessary metadata and static assets from all emoji packs.
After installing and activating an emoji pack, restart NodeBB, Build Emoji Assets, then Restart and Rebuild NodeBB.
